category.name: Configuration.Reports
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Crf_report_render_style
preference.preference_description: Specifies the rendering CSS style of the html reports. The styles are the values of xml attribute "category" defined in the file "TC_DATA/crf/CrfReportRenderStyles.xml". User can modify the existing styles or create own styles. Following are the OOTB valid values: * AW: The reports are generated with AW look. This is the default value. * Classic: The reports are generated with classic look.
